      • endOfTurn

        public void endOfTurn()

      • shootFrenzy

        public void shootFrenzy​(ShootingParametersInput input)
                 throws NotAllowedTargetException,
                        NotAllowedMoveException,
                        NotEnoughAmmoException,
                        NotAllowedShootingModeException
        This is the method to make the action shoot in Frenzy mode
        Parameters:
        input - is a class that contains all the input for the weapon in order to shoot
        Throws:
        NotAllowedTargetException - if the problem in the shoot concerns the target
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is too much
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player cannot reload his weapon because he doesn't have enough ammo
        NotAllowedShootingModeException - if the input for the shooting is not correct

      • makeAction1Frenzy

        public void makeAction1Frenzy​(Square destination,
                              ShootingParametersInput input,
                              Player player)
                       throws WrongStatusException,
                              NotEnoughAmmoException,
                              NotAllowedShootingModeException,
                              NotAllowedMoveException,
                              NotAllowedTargetException
        This method makes the action 1 Frenzy Boosted (move + reload + shoot)
        Parameters:
        destination - is the square where you want to move
        input - is a class that contains all the input for the weapon in order to shoot
        player - is the player who is doing the action
        Throws:
        WrongStatusException - if the player is not allowed to do this action
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player cannot reload his weapon because he doesn't have enough ammo
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is more than 1
        NotAllowedShootingModeException - if the input for the shooting is not correct
        NotAllowedTargetException - if the problem in the shoot concerns the target
        See Also:
        RoundStatus

      • makeAction1FrenzyLower

        public void makeAction1FrenzyLower​(Square destination,
                                   ShootingParametersInput input,
                                   Player player)
                            throws WrongStatusException,
                                   NotEnoughAmmoException,
                                   NotAllowedMoveException,
                                   NotAllowedShootingModeException,
                                   NotAllowedTargetException
        This method makes the action 1 Frenzy Lower (move + move + reload + shoot)
        Parameters:
        destination - is the square where you want to move
        input - is a class that contains all the input for the weapon in order to shoot
        player - is the player who is doing the action
        Throws:
        WrongStatusException - if the player is not allowed to do this action
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player cannot reload his weapon because he doesn't have enough ammo
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is more than 2
        NotAllowedShootingModeException - if the input for the shooting is not correct
        NotAllowedTargetException - if the problem in the shoot concerns the target
        See Also:
        RoundStatus

      • makeAction2Frenzy

        public void makeAction2Frenzy​(Square destination,
                              Player player)
                       throws NotAllowedMoveException,
                              WrongStatusException
        This method makes the action 2 Frenzy Boosted (move + move + move + move)
        Parameters:
        destination - is the square where you want to move
        player - is the player who is doing the action
        Throws:
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is more than 4
        WrongStatusException - if the player is not allowed to do this action
        See Also:
        RoundStatus

      • makeAction3Frenzy

        public void makeAction3Frenzy​(Square destination,
                              int numbOfWeaponToGrab,
                              Player player,
                              int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
                       throws NotAllowedMoveException,
                              WrongStatusException
        This method makes the action 3 Frenzy Boosted (move + move + grab)
        Parameters:
        destination - is the square where you want to grab
        numbOfWeaponToGrab - is the index of the weapon to grab (if the square in SPAWN type)
        player - is the player who is doing the action
        indexOfWeaponToSwap - only if the player has already 3 weapon, he must discard one weapon before he takes the new one
        Throws:
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is more than 2
        WrongStatusException - if the player is not allowed to do this action
        See Also:
        RoundStatus

      • makeAction2FrenzyLower

        public void makeAction2FrenzyLower​(Square destination,
                                   int numbOfWeaponToGrab,
                                   Player player,
                                   int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
                            throws NotAllowedMoveException,
                                   WrongStatusException
        This method makes the action 2 Frenzy Lower (move + move + move + grab)
        Parameters:
        destination - is the square where you want to grab
        numbOfWeaponToGrab - is the index of the weapon to grab (if the square in SPAWN type)
        player - is the player who is doing the action
        indexOfWeaponToSwap - only if the player has already 3 weapon, he must discard one weapon before he takes the new one
        Throws:
        NotAllowedMoveException - if the square is not an active one, or the distance is more than 3
        WrongStatusException - if the player is not allowed to do this action
        See Also:
        RoundStatus

      • canDoActionFrenzyBoosted

        public java.lang.Boolean canDoActionFrenzyBoosted()
        This method verifies if a player can do the Action Frenzy Boosted

        true if the player can do the action
